Rowdy Wolf:







"What did he say?" Rowdy Wolf said, remembering about Quickstrike. "He said 
that the Maximal were fools and cowards. He said the Predacons were the real 
heros." He blinked. "But he didn't say it exactly like that. He has a rather 
odd dialogue." He grinned. Though I assure you, Zyber, he is right about the 
Predacons." He shook his head. "He meant no harm." He glowered down at 
Zyber. "Is there something you are worried about?"
